verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You crossed the great divide, newline You took our place, newline You offered up Your life though we have failed newline The veil was torn and love remained newline You are Holy, Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Distraction costs us, how we seek your face newline We offer up our lives to bring you praise newline A love the walls cannot contain newline You are holy Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We're rising up in Spirit newline and in truth newline A living sacrifice newline We worship You newline People undivided, Lord hear us sing newline We are yours and You are our King.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: This is our love, newline Hearts joined as one newline Desperate for all your are newline Lord break down these walls newline And see how we love newline Desperate for all you are newline We chase Your heart

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: We didn't come to leave here entertained newline Or worship under any other name newline We're crying our for you alone newline You are holy Lord

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Show us the way to your heart, newline We found our voice newline we found our cause newline we're on our knees, the carper's worm newline We join our hearts newline with distant shores and sing to you Lord.
